title: Ink Saver (Main)
paragraphs: Ink Saver (Main) is an ability in the Splatoon series. It reduces the ink consumption of main weapons, effectively allowing most weapons to fire continuously for longer than without this ability.
The number of ability points for Ink Saver (Main) can be temporarily increased by the following:
This ability decreases the ink usage of the main weapon.
- Number of shots fired by shooters when stacking Ink Saver (Main).
- Amount of time each shooter can shoot with Ink Saver (Main).
- Distance a brush or roller can roll with Ink Saver (Main).
- Number of times a brush or roller can flick with Ink Saver (Main).
- Amount of time that a brush or roller can roll with Ink Saver (Main).
- Number of blasts and sloshes of blasters and sloshers can deal out with Ink Saver (Main).
- Number of full charges chargers and splatlings can fire with Ink Saver (Main).
Ink Saver (Main) is the main ability of:
Some weapons receive a stronger effect than others:
- Number of times a brush or roller can swing with Ink Saver (Main).
- Number of shots blasters, brellas, and sloshers can fire with Ink Saver (Main).
